This project is a simple Next.js website with React and TypeScript (no Tailwind CSS).

## Project Summary

- **Framework**: Next.js 16 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Frontend**: React 19
- **Styling**: Pure CSS (no framework)
- **Development Tools**: ESLint
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Development

- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Visit http://localhost:3000 to view the website
- Edit `src/app/page.tsx` to modify the home page
- Edit `src/app/globals.css` to modify styles
- Use VS Code task "Next.js Development Server" for easy development

## Key Features

- Clean, responsive design with pure CSS
- TypeScript for type safety
- Modern Next.js App Router structure
- React functional components with hooks
- ESLint for code quality
